name: Atelier Circle
summary: Founded Atelier Circle, a software company focused on innovative solutions for clinical research.
highlights: Collaborated with the Colorado Center for Personalized Medicine to publish iMTracker (lifestyle tracking app) on iOS for a pilot study.
Reviewed project specifications and implemented open source solutions that met or exceeded end user expectations.
Worked with medical and statistical field experts to design user-interfaces that are engaging, simple, and informative for non-technical users while maintaining consent for researcher purposes.
Introduced agile methodologies and development best practices to codebase to streamline product development and exceed client expectations.
